title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description: Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt.
OB: Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the item is not selected.
EB: Expected Behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and visually indicated as selected.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Add a label in the library file. 2. Select the label item in the library outline view. 3. Verify that the label item is not selected on the first attempt.
